pr_title: NMS-12889: Fix duplicated key for multi-app services

timeline.message: NMS-12889: Fix duplicated key for multi-app services

timeline.bodyText:
Just to be sure to cover all cases - can you add additional tests for:

application with services and without locations
application with locations and without services
timeline.author: christianpape
